metadata.title: MINI_PIPE Combined TODO Index
metadata.description: Consolidated index of all TODO documents and action plans for MINI_PIPE project

documents.title: Versioning Operating Contract
documents.summary: Comprehensive versioning strategy for documentation-as-code with SemVer, git tagging, and audit trails

key_sections.description: Documentation treated as code - versioned, reviewed, and tagged like software
Machine-readable metadata for all governance documents
Mutable planning docs vs frozen execution contracts
Log policy versions in every pipeline run ledger

implementation_requirements: Add front matter to all governance docs
Add runtime version extraction to pipeline
validation_checklist: Git tags created automatically on merge

documents.title: Error Automation - Remaining Tasks
documents.summary: Complete implementation of error automation system with patch validation, PR creation, and monitoring

documents.title: ACMS Project - Actual Fix Plan
documents.summary: Fix 5 critical and 3 medium priority issues preventing ACMS from running properly

critical.name: Remove Legacy core.* Imports
critical.solution: Delete legacy files or stub out broken imports

verification_checklist: All src.acms.* imports work without sys.path hacks
Schema validation finds and loads schemas
pytest tests/unit/ runs without import errors
No references to non-existent core.* modules

documents.title: MASTER_SPLINTER - Remaining Actions
documents.summary: Complete MASTER_SPLINTER automation with secrets configuration, real execution, GitHub integration, and email reporting

tasks.name: Configure Secrets
requirements: GITHUB_TOKEN (GitHub PAT with repo, workflow scopes)

tasks.name: Add Secrets to GitHub Repository
tasks.method: gh secret set or web interface

tasks.name: Step 1 - Real Tool Execution
changes: Implement real CLI tool calls via CLIAdapter

tasks.name: Step 2 - GitHub API Integration
changes: Generate PR body with workstream metadata

documents.title: MINI_PIPE Performance Optimization Plan
documents.summary: Systematic data-driven performance optimization with 3 implementation waves targeting 15-80% speedup

tasks.name: Router State I/O Batching
tasks.problem: File I/O on every update (100+ writes per execution)

tasks.name: Set-Based State Checks
tasks.problem: List membership O(n) in hot loops

tasks.name: Priority Queue Clustering
tasks.solution: Replace with heapq priority queue for O(n log n)

tasks.name: Optimized Topological Sort
tasks.solution: Cache dependency counts for O(1) checks

tasks.name: Generator Pattern for Memory Optimization
tasks.solution: Return iterator instead of materialized list
tasks.expected_impact: 50-90% memory reduction for large result sets

per_task: Run full test suite with coverage

profiling_tools.install: pip install py-spy line-profiler pytest-benchmark memory-profiler

success_criteria.wave_3_complete: CI/CD integrated, regression tests prevent future issues
success_criteria.documentation: All changes documented with profiling evidence

documents.title: MINI_PIPE Codebase Optimization Action Plan
documents.summary: Measurement-driven optimization plan with 6 phases targeting 20-40% execution time improvement
documents.key_finding: 11 O(n) list membership checks and 14 large files (>300 lines) identified for optimization

phase_1_measurement.title: Measurement & Baseline
phase_1_measurement.objective: Establish performance baselines using profiling tools

actions.name: Deterministic Profiling
actions.output: Ranked list of functions by execution time

tasks.name: O(n) → O(1) List Lookup Conversion
tasks.impact: Non-linear performance improvement for large datasets
tasks.pattern: Convert list membership checks to set/frozenset lookups

safety_measures: Full test suite passes before merge

documents.title: Claude Codebase Performance Audit
documents.summary: Comprehensive performance audit results identifying critical bottlenecks and optimization opportunities across MINI_PIPE codebase

tasks.name: Priority Queue Clustering
tasks.solution: heapq priority queue for O(n log n)

tasks.name: Optimized Topological Sort
tasks.solution: Cache dependency counts for O(1) checks

profiling_tools_required.install_command: pip install py-spy line-profiler pytest-benchmark memory-profiler

success_criteria.wave_3: CI/CD integrated, regression tests prevent future issues
success_criteria.documentation: All changes documented with profiling evidence

performance.note: Includes TODO_005 (floating-roaming-umbrella), TODO_006 (OPTIMIZATION_ACTION_PLAN), and TODO_007 (Claude Audit)

tasks.rationale: Blocking issues preventing system from running

recommended_execution_order.expected_outcome: All systems operational and ready for enhancement work

tasks.rationale: High impact, low effort performance gains

recommended_execution_order.expected_outcome: Full automation suite operational, performance optimized, governance in place

immediate_blockers: TODO_003: Fix critical ACMS bugs (2 hours)
highest_impact_low_effort: TODO_005/TODO_007 Wave 1: Performance quick wins (3.5 hours for 15-50% speedup)
TODO_006 Phase 2: Algorithmic optimizations (convert 11 O(n) to O(1))
TODO_002 TODO-001 to TODO-004: Error automation deployment (1.5 hours)
continuous_improvements: TODO_005/TODO_007 Wave 3: Performance regression tests in CI
TODO_006 Phase 1: Continuous profiling with py-spy and cProfile

performance_optimization_notes.convergence: TODO_005, TODO_006, and TODO_007 are complementary plans addressing same codebase
performance_optimization_notes.recommended_approach: Use TODO_007 (Claude Audit) as primary plan - most detailed with concrete line numbers
performance_optimization_notes.supplementary: TODO_006 provides measurement methodology and TODO_005 adds infrastructure tasks
performance_optimization_notes.total_performance_effort: 22.5 hours (TODO_005) + 40 hours (TODO_006) + 0 hours (TODO_007 analysis) = 62.5 hours estimated

changes: Added TODO_006: MINI_PIPE Codebase Optimization Action Plan (40 hours)
Added TODO_007: Claude Codebase Performance Audit (analysis complete)
Updated performance category: 3 documents, 51 tasks, 62.5 hours
Identified complementary nature of three performance plans
